mapper.select: SELECT b.book_idx, b.book_title, b.book_contents, t.tag_content, b.user_idx, u.user_local, f.stored_file_path, b.hit_cnt, b.create_date FROM book b JOIN tag t ON b.detail_category = t.tag_idx JOIN book_file f ON b.book_idx = f.book_idx JOIN user u ON b.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE b.deleted_yn = 'N' AND f.deleted_yn = 'N' AND (b.book_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR b.book_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR t.tag_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR u.user_local LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%')) GROUP BY b.book_title ORDER BY b.create_date DESC;

SELECT b.book_idx, b.book_title, b.book_contents, t.tag_content, b.user_idx, u.user_local, f.stored_file_path, b.hit_cnt, b.create_date FROM book b JOIN tag t ON b.detail_category = t.tag_idx JOIN book_file f ON b.book_idx = f.book_idx JOIN user u ON b.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE b.deleted_yn = 'N' AND f.deleted_yn = 'N' AND (b.book_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR b.book_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR t.tag_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR u.user_local LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%')) GROUP BY b.book_title ORDER BY b.hit_cnt DESC;
